name: cooperate
description: Convention based composition tool that let's you compose a series of objects into a single object quickly.

scripts.major: npm version major -m "published to npm as v%s" && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "published to npm as v%s" && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "published to npm as v%s" && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: Chad Macey
